title: Big Movie Studio Sale: Paramount Wins Warner Bros
summary: Paramount is set to buy Warner Bros, a famous movie studio, for about $111 billion. Netflix was also trying to buy it but decided not to because the price was too high. Warner Bros said Paramount's offer was better. This big sale could change how movies and TV shows are made and watched. Netflix said they were careful with their money and didn't want to pay more. The deal needs approval from government officials to make sure it's fair. If it happens, Paramount will own Warner Bros, including its movies and TV networks like CNN. This is a big story in Hollywood.

background_read: This article is about a big business deal in the movie industry. Companies like Paramount and Netflix are trying to buy Warner Bros, which makes movies and TV shows. Sales like this can change what we watch on TV or in theaters. It's important because it affects jobs and entertainment. Government officials check to make sure the deal is fair for everyone.
Article_Structure: WHO: Paramount and Warner Bros are the main companies involved, with Netflix as a former bidder.
WHAT: Paramount is set to buy Warner Bros for $111 billion after Netflix dropped out.
WHERE: This is happening in Hollywood, California, and needs approval from officials there and in other places.
WHY: The sale could reshape the media landscape by changing who owns major studios and networks like CNN.
